sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-form
    :model="registerForm"
    :rules="registerRules"
    :label-position="labelPosition"
    ref="registerForm"
    @keyup.enter.native="onSubmit"
    class="register-form"
  >
    <el-form-item label="Áî®Êà∑Âêç" prop="UserName">
      <el-input
        v-model="registerForm.UserName"
        placeholder="ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•Áî®Êà∑Âêç"
        class="register-input"
      ></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="ÂØÜÁ†Å" prop="Password">
      <el-input
        v-model="registerForm.Password"
        type="password"
        placeholder="ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•ÂØÜÁ†ÅÔºàËá≥Â∞ë8‰ΩçÔºåÂåÖÂê´Â§ßÂ∞èÂÜôÂ≠óÊØç„ÄÅÊï∞Â≠óÂíåÁâπÊÆäÂ≠óÁ¨¶Ôºâ"
        class="register-input"
        show-password
      ></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="ÈÇÆÁÆ±" prop="Email">
      <el-input
        v-model="registerForm.Email"
        type="email"
        placeholder="ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•ÈÇÆÁÆ±Âú∞ÂùÄ"
        class="register-input"
      ></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="ÊâãÊú∫Âè∑" prop="Phone">
      <el-input
        v-model="registerForm.Phone"
        placeholder="ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•ÊâãÊú∫Âè∑"
        class="register-input"
      ></el-input>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="ÊÄßÂà´" prop="Gender">
      <el-select
        v-model="registerForm.Gender"
        placeholder="ËØ∑ÈÄâÊã©ÊÄßÂà´ÔºàÂèØÈÄâÔºâ"
        class="register-input"
        clearable
      >
        <el-option label="Áî∑" :value="1"></el-option>
        <el-option label="Â•≥" :value="2"></el-option>
        <el-option label="ÂÖ∂‰ªñ" :value="0"></el-option>
      </el-select>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item label="Âπ¥ÈæÑ" prop="Age">
      <el-input-number
        v-model="registerForm.Age"
        :min="1"
        :max="120"
        placeholder="ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•Âπ¥ÈæÑÔºàÂèØÈÄâÔºâ"
        class="register-input"
        controls-position="right"
      ></el-input-number>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item>
      <el-button type="primary" class="register-btn" @click="onSubmit">
        Ê≥®ÂÜå
      </el-button>
    </el-form-item>
    <el-form-item>
      <el-button class="register-btn-secondary" @click="goBack">
        ËøîÂõû
      </el-button>
    </el-form-item>
  </el-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'Register',
  data() {
    return {
      labelPosition: 'top',
      registerForm: {
        UserName: '',
        Password: '',
        Email: '',
        Phone: '',
        Gender: 0, // ÈªòËÆ§ÈÄâÊã©"ÂÖ∂‰ªñ"
        Age: null,
      },
      registerRules: {
        UserName: [
          { required: true, message: 'ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•Áî®Êà∑Âêç', trigger: 'blur' },
          {
            min: 3,
            max: 20,
            message: 'Áî®Êà∑ÂêçÈïøÂ∫¶Â∫î‰∏∫3-20‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶',
            trigger: 'blur',
          },
        ],
        Password: [
          { required: true, message: 'ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•ÂØÜÁ†Å', trigger: 'blur' },
          {
            min: 8,
            max: 128,
            message: 'ÂØÜÁ†ÅÈïøÂ∫¶Â∫î‰∏∫8-128‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶',
            trigger: 'blur',
          },
          {
            validator: (rule, value, callback) => {
              if (!value) return callback();

              const hasUpper = /[A-Z]/.test(value);
              const hasLower = /[a-z]/.test(value);
              const hasDigit = /\d/.test(value);
              const hasSpecial = /[!@#$%^&*()_+\-=[\]{}|;:,.<>?]/.test(value);

              if (!hasUpper || !hasLower || !hasDigit || !hasSpecial) {
                callback(
                  new Error('ÂØÜÁ†ÅÂøÖÈ°ªÂåÖÂê´Â§ßÂÜôÂ≠óÊØç„ÄÅÂ∞èÂÜôÂ≠óÊØç„ÄÅÊï∞Â≠óÂíåÁâπÊÆäÂ≠óÁ¨¶')
                );
              } else {
                callback();
              }
            },
            trigger: 'blur',
          },
        ],
        Email: [
          { required: true, message: 'ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•ÈÇÆÁÆ±Âú∞ÂùÄ', trigger: 'blur' },
          { type: 'email', message: 'ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•ÊúâÊïàÁöÑÈÇÆÁÆ±Âú∞ÂùÄ', trigger: 'blur' },
        ],
        Phone: [
          { required: true, message: 'ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•ÊâãÊú∫Âè∑', trigger: 'blur' },
          {
            pattern: /^1[3-9]\d{9}$/,
            message: 'ËØ∑ËæìÂÖ•ÊúâÊïàÁöÑÊâãÊú∫Âè∑',
            trigger: 'blur',
          },
        ],
        Gender: [],
        Age: [{ type: 'number', message: 'Âπ¥ÈæÑÂøÖÈ°ª‰∏∫Êï∞Â≠ó', trigger: 'blur' }],
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async onSubmit() {
      try {
        console.log('ÂºÄÂßãÊ≥®ÂÜåÊµÅÁ®ã...');

        // È™åËØÅË°®Âçï
        await this.$refs.registerForm.validate();
        console.log('Ë°®ÂçïÈ™åËØÅÈÄöËøá');

        // ÂáÜÂ§áÊï∞ÊçÆ
        const registerData = {
          UserName: this.registerForm.UserName,
          Password: this.registerForm.Password,
          Email: this.registerForm.Email,
          Phone: this.registerForm.Phone,
          Gender:
            this.registerForm.Gender !== null ? this.registerForm.Gender : '',
          Age: this.registerForm.Age || 0,
        };

        console.log('ÂéüÂßãË°®ÂçïÊï∞ÊçÆ:', this.registerForm);
        console.log('ÂáÜÂ§áÂèëÈÄÅÁöÑÊ≥®ÂÜåÊï∞ÊçÆ:', registerData);
        console.log('ÊÄßÂà´ÂÄºËØ¶ÊÉÖ:', {
          ÂéüÂßãÂÄº: this.registerForm.Gender,
          Á±ªÂûã: typeof this.registerForm.Gender,
          Â§ÑÁêÜÂêéÁöÑÂÄº: registerData.Gender,
          Â§ÑÁêÜÂêéÁöÑÁ±ªÂûã: typeof registerData.Gender,
        });

        // Ë∞ÉÁî®Ê≥®ÂÜåAPI
        const result = await this.$store.dispatch(
          'user/register',
          registerData
        );
        console.log('Ê≥®ÂÜåAPIËøîÂõûÁªìÊûú:', result);

        if (result.success) {
          console.log('Ê≥®ÂÜåÊàêÂäüÔºÅ');

          // Ê≥®ÂÜåÊàêÂäüÊ∂àÊÅØ
          this.$message.success('Ê≥®ÂÜåÊàêÂäüÔºÅÁ≥ªÁªüÂ∑≤‰∏∫ÊÇ®ÂèëÊîæ100ÁßØÂàÜÊ≥®ÂÜåÂ•ñÂä±');

          // ÊòæÁ§∫Ê≥®ÂÜåÊàêÂäüÂºπÁ™ó
          await this.showInfoformRegister(result);

          // Ê∏ÖÁ©∫Ë°®Âçï
          this.resetForm();

          // Ë∑≥ËΩ¨Âà∞È¶ñÈ°µ
          this.$router.push('/');
        } else {
          console.error('Ê≥®ÂÜåÂ§±Ë¥•ÔºåÈîôËØØ‰ø°ÊÅØ:', result.message);
          throw new Error(result.message || 'Ê≥®ÂÜåÂ§±Ë¥•');
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Ê≥®ÂÜåËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠ÂèëÁîüÈîôËØØ:', error);
        console.error('ÈîôËØØËØ¶ÊÉÖ:', {
          message: error.message,
          response: error.response,
          stack: error.stack,
        });

        let errorMessage = 'Ê≥®ÂÜåÂ§±Ë¥•ÔºåËØ∑ÈáçËØï';

        if (error.response) {
          console.error('HTTPÈîôËØØÂìçÂ∫î:', error.response.data);
          errorMessage =
            error.response.data.message ||
            error.response.data.error ||
            errorMessage;
        } else if (error.message) {
          errorMessage = error.message;
        }

        this.$message.error(errorMessage);
      }
    },

    showInfoformRegister(result) {
      const h = this.$createElement;

      // ËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™Promise
      return new Promise((resolve) => {
        this.$msgbox({
          title: 'Ê≥®ÂÜåÊàêÂäüÔºÅ',
          message: h('p', null, [
            h('span', null, `üéâ Ê¨¢ËøéÂä†ÂÖ•RAZOR-AIÔºÅ`),
            h('p', null, [
              h(
                'span',
                { style: 'font-weight: bold; color: #409EFF;' },
                `Áî®Êà∑Âêç: ${this.registerForm.UserName}`
              ),
            ]),
            h('p', null, [
              h(
                'span',
                { style: 'font-weight: bold; color: #67C23A;' },
                `Ê≥®ÂÜåÁä∂ÊÄÅ: ${result.success ? 'ÊàêÂäü' : 'Â§±Ë¥•'}`
              ),
            ]),
            h(
              'div',
              {
                style:
                  'margin: 15px 0; padding: 10px; background: #f0f9ff; border-left: 4px solid #409eff; border-radius: 4px;',
              },
              [
                h(
                  'p',
                  {
                    style:
                      'margin: 0 0 8px 0; font-weight: bold; color: #409eff;',
                  },
                  'üéÅ Êñ∞Áî®Êà∑Ê≥®ÂÜåÂ•ñÂä±'
                ),
                h(
                  'p',
                  { style: 'margin: 0 0 5px 0; font-size: 14px; color: #333;' },
                  '‚ú® ÊÇ®Â∑≤Ëé∑Âæó 100 ÁßØÂàÜÂ•ñÂä±'
                ),
                h(
                  'p',
                  { style: 'margin: 0 0 5px 0; font-size: 12px; color: #666;' },
                  'ÁßØÂàÜÂèØÁî®‰∫éË¥≠‰π∞Êú∫Âô®‰∫∫ÂäüËÉΩ„ÄÅËß£ÈîÅÈ´òÁ∫ßÊúçÂä°Á≠â'
                ),
                h(
                  'p',
                  { style: 'margin: 0; font-size: 12px; color: #409eff;' },
                  'üí° ÁôªÂΩïÂêéÂèØÂú®‰∏™‰∫∫‰∏ªÈ°µÊü•ÁúãÁßØÂàÜÊòéÁªÜ'
                ),
              ]
            ),
          ]),
          confirmButtonText: 'Á°ÆÂÆö',
          beforeClose: (action, instance, done) => {
            if (action === 'confirm') {
              instance.confirmButtonLoading = true; // ÂºÄÂêØÁ°ÆÂÆöÊåâÈíÆÁöÑÂä†ËΩΩÁä∂ÊÄÅ
              instance.confirmButtonText = 'Ê≥®ÂÜåÊàêÂäüÔºåÊ≠£Âú®Ë∑≥ËΩ¨È¶ñÈ°µ'; // ‰øÆÊîπÁ°ÆÂÆöÊåâÈíÆÁöÑÊñáÂ≠ó
              setTimeout(() => {
                done(); // ÂÖ≥Èó≠ÂºπÁ™ó
                resolve(); // ÊâßË°åresolveÔºåÊ†áËÆ∞PromiseÂÆåÊàê
                instance.confirmButtonLoading = false; // ÊÅ¢Â§çÊåâÈíÆÁä∂ÊÄÅ
              }, 500); // Âª∂Ëøü0.5ÁßíÔºåÁ≠âÂæÖÂºπÁ™óÁöÑÁî®Êà∑‰∫§‰∫í
            } else {
              done();
            }
          },
        });
      });
    },

    resetForm() {
      this.registerForm.UserName = '';
      this.registerForm.Password = '';
      this.registerForm.Email = '';
      this.registerForm.Phone = '';
      this.registerForm.Gender = null;
      this.registerForm.Age = null;
    },

    goBack() {
      this.$router.go(-1);
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
@use '@/assets/styles/mixins.scss' as *;
@use '@/assets/styles/variables.scss' as *;
.register-form {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 500px;
  margin: 100px auto;
  padding: 30px;
  background: $card-background-color;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: $box-shadow-medium;
  font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
}

/* ËæìÂÖ•Ê°ÜÊ†∑Âºè */
.register-input {
  width: 100%;
}

.register-input .el-input__inner {
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 25px;
  padding: 12px 20px;
  padding-right: 45px; /* ‰∏∫ÂØÜÁ†ÅÊòæÁ§∫ÊåâÈíÆÁïôÂá∫Á©∫Èó¥ */
  font-size: 16px;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  color: $text-color;
  border: 1px solid $border-color;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.register-input .el-input__inner:hover,
.register-input .el-input__inner:focus {
  border-color: $accent-color;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
}

/* ÂØÜÁ†ÅÊòæÁ§∫ÊåâÈíÆÊ†∑ÂºèË∞ÉÊï¥ */
.register-input .el-input__suffix {
  right: 12px; /* Ë∞ÉÊï¥ÊåâÈíÆ‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåÁ°Æ‰øùÂú®ËæπÊ°ÜÂÜÖ */
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
}

.register-input .el-input__suffix-inner {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.register-input .el-input__suffix-inner .el-input__icon {
  color: $text-color;
  font-size: 18px;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 2px;
}

/* ÊåâÈíÆÊ†∑Âºè */
.register-btn {
  width: 100%;
  margin-top: 20px;
  padding: 15px;
  font-size: 18px;
  border-radius: 50px;
  background: $accent-color;
  color: white;
  transition:
    background 0.3s ease,
    transform 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: $box-shadow-light;
}

.register-btn:hover {
  background: $accent-hover-color;
  transform: translateY(-3px); /* Èº†Ê†áÊÇ¨ÊµÆÊó∂Êä¨ÂçáÊïàÊûú */
}

.register-btn:active {
  transform: translateY(2px); /* ÁÇπÂáªÊó∂‰∏ãÂéãÊïàÊûú */
}

.register-btn-secondary {
  width: 100%;
  margin-top: 10px;
  padding: 15px;
  font-size: 18px;
  border-radius: 50px;
  background: $secondary-color;
  color: $text-color;
  transition:
    background 0.3s ease,
    transform 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: $box-shadow-light;
}

.register-btn-secondary:hover {
  background: $hover-background-color;
  transform: translateY(-3px); /* Èº†Ê†áÊÇ¨ÊµÆÊó∂Êä¨ÂçáÊïàÊûú */
}

.register-btn-secondary:active {
  transform: translateY(2px); /* ÁÇπÂáªÊó∂‰∏ãÂéãÊïàÊûú */
}

/* Ë°®ÂçïÊ†áÁ≠æ */
.el-form-item label {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: $text-color;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
</style>
